testcase.name: I am able to add edit, search and delete the employee
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to PIM after log in with Admin user..........................passed When I Add employee with first name as "AutUserFname" and mname as "AutUserMname" and lName as "AutUserLname".passed Then I verify employeeAdded in list with first name as "AutUserFname" and mname as "AutUserMname" and lName as "AutUserLname".passed When I click on Edit button and update below values and save the Data.......passed Then I search the employee and ensure that it is searched using below values.passed And I select and Delete the Updated Employee and verify employee is not in search result.passed
